channel.description: Recent content in Cocoa on Superbil.nil

item.title: iOS enter background
item.description: If yout want to do something in background… __block UIBackgroundTaskIdentifier backgroundId = [[UIApplication sharedApplication] beginBackgroundTaskWithExpirationHandler:^{ [[UIApplication sharedApplication] endBackgroundTask:backgroundId]; backgroundId = UIBackgroundTaskInvalid; }]; dispatch_async(dispatch_get_global_queue(DISPATCH_QUEUE_PRIORITY_DEFAULT, (unsigned long)NULL), ^{ // do some thing you want to ... });
